alert.note: Alert for Fairfield; Litchfield (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 10 at 9:55AM EST until January 11 at 1:27AM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL JUST AFTER MIDNIGHT TONIGHT... * WHAT...Major flooding is occurring and major flooding is forecast. This approaches the flood of record. * WHERE...Still River at Brookfield. * WHEN...Until just after midnight tonight. * IMPACTS...At 16.0 feet, Water gets into some buildings near the river. Many roads closed and parking lots flooded. Please listen to local emergency management for additional information. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:45 AM EST Wednesday the stage was 16.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to approximately 17.0 feet this morning. After cresting, the river will quickly fall below flood stage by early this evening. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && &&
